channel.title: Raillery, Reason, and a Rapier's Wit (Thursdays in May, 8 pm CET)
channel.description:
This is going to be a game of Sense, Sensibility and Swordsmanship, about Regency persons secretly climbing rooftops and fighting with razor-sharp blades while also maintaining a perfectly proper existence.
This is the first event in a series of four. Participating in every session is encouraged but not necessary. You have to sign up for each session you wish to join.
We will be playing with the X-Card, lines & veils and an Open Table policy. [date=2019-05-02 time=20:00:00 timezone="Europe/Berlin"] → [date=2019-05-02 time=23:00:00 timezone="Europe/Berlin"]: https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-L_EYihEJ9JfGsaZ2dSV [date=2019-05-09 time=20:00:00 timezone="Europe/Berlin"] → [date=2019-05-09 time=23:00:00 timezone="Europe/Berlin"]: https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-L_EYwwdRBKiYGmfQ66M [date=2019-05-16 time=20:00:00 timezone="Europe/Berlin"] → [date=2019-05-16 time=23:00:00 timezone="Europe/Berlin"]: https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-L_EZ7omVAEjveN2dmcJ [date=2019-05-23 time=20:00:00 timezone="Europe/Berlin"] → [date=2019-05-23 time=23:00:00 timezone="Europe/Berlin"]: https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-L_EZHXN3T2XJhxq8vLn
